summary: This mod is a stahlrim HeavyArmor and LightArmor replace mod excepted.
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]Gp-sLakXNGU[/youtube]

[size=5][b][Description][/b][/size]

[size=3]This mod is a stahlrim HeavyArmor and LightArmor replace mod excepted.
Now ice is glow and inside of ice has refraction, So you can see a different appearance according to your move.
The texture is in a separate folder. Therefore, there will be no change due to other mods.

There are two versions. stalhrim replace and stalhrim replace standalone
A new stalhrim armors can be built using a blacksmith while keeping the existing stalhrim armors intact. (But you should know the stalhrim smelting.)
Use only one version[/size]
[b]
[size=5][Installation][/size][/b]
[size=3]If you use MO or NMM, there is no special to do. Install it like another mod.
If you don’t use them, unpack the mod files and put in here.
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data[/size]

[size=5][b][Uninstall][/b][/size]
[size=3]If you use MO or NMM, there is no special to do. Delete it like another mod.
If you don’t use them, delete these files.
[/size]
[size=4]- Replacer Ver[/size]
[size=3]Data\Meshes\dlc02\Armor\stahlrimheavy
Data\Meshes\dlc02\Armor\stahlrimlight
Data\Textures\dlc02\armor\stahlrimheavyRe
Data\Textures\dlc02\armor\stahlrimlightRe
Data\Textures\dlc02\stahlrimMiscRe[/size]

[size=4]-StandAlone Ver[/size]
[size=3]Data\StalhrimArmorsReplaceLE.esp
Data\Meshes\dlc02\Armor\Cardstahlrimheavy
Data\Meshes\dlc02\Armor\Cardstahlrimlight
Data\Textures\dlc02\armor\stahlrimheavyRe
Data\Textures\dlc02\armor\stahlrimlightRe
Data\Textures\dlc02\stahlrimMiscRe
[/size]


[size=5][b][Permissions][/b][/size]
[size=3]please let me know beforehand. [/size]

[size=5][b][Used tool][/b][/size]
[size=3]Photoshop, Nifskope, CreationKit [/size][size=3]
[/size]



[b][size=5][Stalhrim Weapon [b][size=5]Replace [/size][/b] Ver] [/size][/b]
[size=3]
